metadata.name: Emergence 001
metadata.description: Each artwork of this unique collection is composed of a unique video created using artificial intelligence algorithms, based on the movements of a dancer, sublimed by an aesthetic inspired from the four seasons represented by four emblematic ballets. The video is accompanied by a unique music for each artwork, composed with the help of other algorithms. Each artwork is unique, both visually and musically, and presents a dreamt ballet, an algorithmic choreography in which the stage is set for pure creation, and for the magic of the moment. The room grows dark and quiet, then, from the movements choreographed with precision, emerges a sensation, a sharing, an invitation to enter another dimension.
